name: Halloween Pop Mania
description:
A very addictive elimination game, don't miss it! You tap groups of 3 or more same pumpkins. Tap as many groups as possible until one column reaches the top of the screen. Gear up for this addictive and relaxing game and you won't be able to put this game down for hours.

Features:
Very cute graphics.
Game Center leaderboards.
Endless game, unlimited fun.
Universal game: iPhone, iPad, iPad Mini, iPod Touch.

Tester feedback
It's good for any age.
Mindless fun.
Great way to pass time.

Enjoy!
